<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Sun Oct 12 04:25:10 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="mad girl's love song" node_id="1427453" parent_e2node="1427442" author_user="Simpleton">The girl wants something harder</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Mister Chu" node_id="2114260" parent_e2node="1736421" author_user="etouffee">today we paint tomorrow</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="shaogo" node_id="2115738" parent_e2node="197066" author_user="Bitriot">Bolt</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Scout Finch" node_id="1084891" parent_e2node="832162" author_user="deep thought">Tell the truth. Begin by beginning. Say good things to yourself.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="1156459" parent_e2node="1155895" author_user="stand/alone/bitch">These are for you</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="StuartO)))" node_id="1949353" parent_e2node="1949330" author_user="wertperch">Your organic hemp shopping bag alone cannot save the world</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2115943" parent_e2node="2115942" author_user="Mister Chu">During being fifty three</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2115977" parent_e2node="2055909" author_user="Rancid_Pickle">a message lodged in the machine</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="656096" parent_e2node="656094" author_user="junkpile">The train station was fucking freezing and</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="711732" parent_e2node="711712" author_user="prole">drinking whiskey in the park at night</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="1687955" parent_e2node="1090780" author_user="Jack">we make lights to answer the stars</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="DonJaime" node_id="2065746" parent_e2node="1794047" author_user="xunker">solid state disk</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Rainey" node_id="1300737" parent_e2node="489022" author_user="ModernAngel">How to get in touch with your feminine side</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="shaogo" node_id="2115865" parent_e2node="2115869" author_user="corvus">My Photoshoot with a Porn Star</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="go ahead I'll listen" node_id="1453869" parent_e2node="61436" author_user="notNEAL">Waffle House</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
